attributes.action: To amend the General election ballot paper to always include "none of the above"
attributes.additional_details: To amend the general election ballot paper to always include "None of the above". This will allow the distinction between voters who feel there is no suitable representation for them and voters who simply do not want to vote.  This will also demonstrate whether the government truly has a mandate for its policies.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/2015
